dstm2.factory.ofree

Class Adapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dstm2.factory.ofree.Adapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter<T>, Releasable, Snapable<T>

    public class Adapter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Adapter<T>, Releasable, Snapable<T>
    Obstruction-free atomic object implementation. Visible reads. Supports snapshots and early release.

    • Nested Class Summary
